content: Oct 30 Stericycle Inc has reached a $26.75 million settlement of allegations that the medical waste disposal company overcharged government entities in several U.S. states  Illinois Attorney General Lisa Madigan announced on Friday.
name: Stericycle Inc

content: Waste disposal company Stericycle Inc  said it would buy privately held Shred-it International  a secure information destruction services provider  for $2.3 billion in cash.
name: Stericycle Inc
title: Waste disposal firm Stericycle to buy Shred-it for $2.3 billion

content: July 15 Waste disposal company Stericycle Inc  said it would buy privately held Shred-it International  a secure information destruction services provider  for $2.3 billion in cash.
name: Stericycle Inc
title: Waste disposal firm Stericycle to buy Shred-it for $2.3 bln
